body:
Hey guys, I'm Characteristics. I've been a member for over a year now but I've been inactive for about 11 months. I started Minecraft in 1.3.2 and I am proud to say I'm Aussie. Other than that, here's some other things you might want to know about me:
Age: 15
Location: Sydney, Australia
Favourite Food: Cheesy Pepperoni Pizza <3
Favourite Drink: Strawberry Milk
Favourite Colour: Light Blue
Sports I enjoy: Soccer/Football, Rugby League, Touch Footy, Oz-Tag and Gym.
Music I enjoy: Nearly anything on Monstercat, Trap and Spinnin' Records.
Miscellaneous: Potato.

If you want to ask questions, I'll answer them too but other than that, hope to meet you guys in game <3

title: My Re-Introduction

replies.body: Hey! Nice to hear that you're back :) I saw you earlier in game today, and I hope to again! Enjoy your time on Avicus. If you ever have any questions or concerns or just need someone to talk to. Feel free to add me on Skype, I'd be delighted to help!
replies.body_tagged: Hey! Nice to hear that you're back :) I saw you earlier in game today, and I hope to again! Enjoy your time on Avicus. If you ever have any questions or concerns or just need someone to talk to. Feel free to add me on Skype, I'd be delighted to help!

replies.body: Yo Characteristics! I'm glad you decided to come back to Avicus! We have a bunch new exciting things since last time you were here and still in store! If you have any questions about them or anything in general, don't hesitate to ask me or another staff member. Besides all that, you seem like a really interesting person! Hopefully I can see you in game as well, enjoy your stay! ^~^
replies.body_tagged: Yo Characteristics! I'm glad you decided to come back to Avicus! We have a bunch new exciting things since last time you were here and still in store! If you have any questions about them or anything in general, don't hesitate to ask me or another staff member. Besides all that, you seem like a really interesting person! Hopefully I can see you in game as well, enjoy your stay! ^~^
